name: Visual Connection
overview:
Established in 1991 Visual Connection, 2009 renamed to KIT digital Czech , is specialized in the supply and delivery of comprehensive digital media solutions, services and components. Within the framework of six divisions it designs, delivers and integrates systems for professional production, processing, distribution and archiving of audiovisual materials. It has been involved in a number of installations which include television and radio stations, graphics, audiovisual production and postproduction, state administration, and healthcare.

The company specializes in designing comprehensive solutions providing a range of services, e.g. consultancy, streaming, webcasting and encoding. We provide service work, training and leasing of equipment. We also offer financial services.

The team works calmly and efficiently, offering the clients an above-standard service. Along with the clients it looks for the most effective technical and organizational solutions to meet their needs. They give priority to long-term and continuous service and support, with an emphasis on maximum technical and organizational quality.

Outstanding level of expertise is supported by an ever-growing number of successfully implemented projects. Visual Connection received the Standout System Integration Award, given for the best integrator of Omneon servers during 2004-2005.

During 2006, KIT digital Czech has implemented the Quality management system in accordance with ISO 9001:2008 standard, maintained still at 2011 with the latest IS 9001:2010 level.

Specialties broadcast, system integration, streaming video, CDN, audio, IPTV

acquisition.source_description: KIT Digital Acquires IPTV Solutions Provider Visual Connection

milestones.description: Visual Connection a.s. was renamed to KIT digital Czech a.s.
